document_data.name: Squid
document_data.mainbody: '''Squid''' was a minor agent of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1379 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Squid was a gambler well known in the city and he knew all the rumors and gossip of Waterdeep. Usually he was in the [[Lucky Mermaid]] gambling hall.
document_data.History: In 1379 DR, after one of his minions, [[Shynlar Draal]], was captured by the [[Unyielding Sword]] mercenaries hired by the slaver [[Lanador]] alongside some other [[elves]], the [[Xanathar]] ordered Squid to arrange a meeting between him and an adventuring party hired by the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] to investigate the matter. Squid managed to organize the meeting and fled. However, the next day, as a security measure, the Xanathar ordered the death of Squid.{{Cite dungeon/206/The Xanathar: Crime Lord of Waterdeep}}
document_data.Personality: Squid was a pompous and frivolous individual.
